test-case.name: fn-namespace-uri-1
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of the fn:namespace-uri function with no argument and no context node. Should raise an error.

test-case.name: fn-namespace-uri-2
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of the fn:namespace-uri function with more than one argument (2 arguments).

test-case.name: fn-namespace-uri-3
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of the fn:namespace-uri function with context node not being a node.

test-case.name: fn-namespace-uri-4
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of the fn:namespace-uri function with argument set to empty sequence.

test-case.name: fn-namespace-uri-5
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of the fn:namespace-uri function with argument set to a directly constructed comment node.

test-case.name: fn-namespace-uri-6
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of the fn:namespace-uri function with argument set to a computed comment node.

test-case.name: fn-namespace-uri-7
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of the fn:namespace-uri function with argument set to a direct processing instruction node.

test-case.name: fn-namespace-uri-8
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of the fn:namespace-uri function with argument set to a computed processing instruction node.

test-case.name: fn-namespace-uri-9
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of the fn:namespace-uri function with argument set to a computed text node.

test-case.name: fn-namespace-uri-10
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of the fn:namespace-uri function with argument set to a direct element node with no namespace.

test-case.name: fn-namespace-uri-11
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of the fn:namespace-uri function with argument set to a computed element node with no namespace.

test-case.name: fn-namespace-uri-12
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of the fn:namespace-uri function with argument set to a direct attribute node with no namespace.

test-case.name: fn-namespace-uri-13
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of the fn:namespace-uri function with argument set to a computed attribute node with no namespace.

test-case.name: fn-namespace-uri-14
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of the fn:namespace-uri function with argument set to an element node with no namespace queried from an xml file.

test-case.name: fn-namespace-uri-15
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of the fn:namespace-uri function with argument set to an attribute node with no namespace queried from an xml file.

test-case.name: fn-namespace-uri-16
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of the fn:namespace-uri function with no argument. Use an element node with no namespace queried from an xml file.

test-case.name: fn-namespace-uri-17
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of the fn:namespace-uri function with argument set to a direct element node with a namespace.

test-case.name: fn-namespace-uri-18
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of the fn:namespace-uri function with argument set to a computed element node (with prefix) that uses a declared namespace.

test-case.name: fn-namespace-uri-19
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of the fn:namespace-uri function with argument set to a computed element node (with no prefix), that should not use a declared namespace.

test-case.name: fn-namespace-uri-20
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of the fn:namespace-uri function with argument set to a direct element node (with no prefix), that should not use a declared namespace.

test-case.name: fn-namespace-uri-21
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of the fn:namespace-uri function with argument set to a direct element node with prefix, that should use a declared namespace.

test-case.name: fn-namespace-uri-22
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of the fn:namespace-uri function with argument set to a direct element node with no prefix, that should use a declared default namespace.

test-case.name: fn-namespace-uri-23
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of the fn:namespace-uri function with argument set to a direct element node with a prefix, that should not use a declared default namespace.

test-case.name: fn-namespace-uri-24
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of the fn:namespace-uri function with argument set to a computed element node with a prefix, that should not use a declared default namespace.

test-case.name: fn-namespace-uri-25
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of the fn:namespace-uri function with argument set to a computed element node with no prefix, that should use a declared default namespace.

test-case.name: fn-namespace-uri-26
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluation of the fn:namespace-uri function with argumen set to "." and no context node. Should raise an error.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-NodeNamespaceURIFunc-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `namespace-uri((), "wrong param")`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-NodeNamespaceURIFunc-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `if(false()) then namespace-uri() else true()`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-NodeNamespaceURIFunc-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `namespace-uri(()) eq xs:anyURI("")`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K2-NodeNamespaceURIFunc-1
test-case.description: Extract the namespace URI from a processing instruction node.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K2-NodeNamespaceURIFunc-2
test-case.description: Extract the namespace URI from a comment node.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K2-NodeNamespaceURIFunc-3
test-case.description: Extract the namespace URI from a text node.
